name: Sham (Demo)
description:
Sham is an interactive visual novel all about working in an illegal medical clinic. With no medical experience and a craving for causing chaos, you can choose to fix up your patient or fight a chair, die in a closet, harass your coworkers, vandalize the building, commit murder, leave early, access your manager's laptop and much more! 

You get 5 days to make or break this medical clinic. And in this demo, you have access to day one. After being in development for over a month, the demo is finally here! 

A quick warning before you play: this is my very first attempt at coding or making a game, ever. I'm still in high school, so don't expect gold. I poured my heart into this thing, so hopefully you'll have a good experience.

You can contact me at doinkadoink#0969 on discord.
